lines.text: [last lines]
[original version]
I love you.
[Tack takes the tacks from his mouth at last]
And I love you.
[they hug]
What a dump! Nobody lives like this except college kids...
Finally, a benefit from my parents being circus people!
underwear.

[makes to the top of the minaret]
OK, OK. Who's got the camera?
Drank my coffee, read the paper, now it's time to get to work.

[lifts smallest ball off mineret]
You're gonna buy me a castle by the sea.
[lifts second ball off]
And you're gonna buy me everything I need to turn the basement into a rec room. And with you,
[lifts third ball off, struggles]
I tell ya, sweetheart, I'm going to Disneyland!
Everything hurts. Why do I *do* this? What's the point?
[catches sight of the Golden Balls]
Oh, *yeah*; pain's gone.

[freeing himself]
Who needs a genie, when a tack will do the trick?
I'm so hungry I could eat a vegetarian.
Ya miss me?
[Zig Zag swats him so he's forced away by several feet]
AHH! Call the Humane Society.
Well, I guess they never ran into a cobbler before.
"Beware of Signs".
Hey! Two trees on the edge of an impossible-to-climb cliff - perfect!
If I find out that's just gold paint...
The balls are gone!

[as he is being eaten by crocodiles]
Ow, my bottom! Ow, my top! Greedys, don't you ever stop?
O Great King Nod, have no fear. Zigzag, your grand vizier is here!

[wakes up]
What, what?
[bored]
Oh, it's *you*... Zigzag!
Your bath's ready! The water's getting cold! Princess, he's a cobbler! Keep your eyes on your work, Cobbler!
Y-yes, ma'am.

[after Princess Yum-Yum and Nanny leave]
Nothing wrong with being a Cobbler. Why can't I ever talk when it matters?

[Zigzag presnts himself before the One-Eye]
Sorceror!
I conjure demons, and charm beasts! And birds of prey, too! Phido!
[makes Phido go through hoops]
But as you see, that's not all I can do! Haha! Hee-hee! I have power over people, too, though they may appear complex. For me... they fall like playing cards... and I control the decks!
[brandishes deck of cards with tricks but they slip up]
Ah! Eh-heh! Ho ho! Ah! Hee-hee! But all this is nothing for now in my hand is the very key to the Golden land, for no man can take it, no matter how great, unless he possesses these three balls
[presents balls]
OF FATE!
You say you can charm beasts?
[laughs to himself]
THROW HIM TO THE ALLIGATORS!

[singing]
But she is more than this / There's a mind in the body of this pretty miss!

This life I live in regal splendor seems a waste. If I could help Father, instead of just sitting as his side. If I could help just one person, maybe then he'd understand there's more to me, I'd be doing something useful.
Do cobblers have names?
[Tack nods]
What *is* your name?

[holds up a tack]
Tack.
Tack? Is that your name?
May I remind you gentlemen that when in doubt, consult the brigand's... book!

[referring to Tack]
*Who* is this?
O Greatest King of all the Earth, this lowball
[uses cane to stop Tack from walking off]
cobbler of no worth, attacked me in the square today! Shall we take his head away?

[waking up]
What? No, no, if you really think so, Zigzag.
But what has he done?

[takes tack from Tack's mouth]
A*ttacked* me!
*Really*?

[hisses]
Yes!
The camp of the One-Eyes... how very nice! Perhaps *they'll* be willing to pay my price! I'll have those barbarians kissing my feet!
[to Phido]
And maybe, we'll find you something to eat... eh, Phido?
ONE-EYES... WIN AGAIN!

[Tack has tripped him]
Ooh-ow! You great fool!

[wakes up]
AAAH! WHAT IF THE BALLS ARE TAKEN AWAY?
A *way* has never been found to take them away! What freak of nature could ever ever get up to the top of that minaret?
[Thief is shown actually going *over* minaret]
Ooh! What's that? Oh, a naked lady. But wait! A golden backscratcher!

[falls into slingshot with one golden ball]
No, guys. Come on. I'm not tall enough to ride this ride. Aaaand I suffer from dizzy-spells, honest. Aaaaaand I'm pregnant!

[flying into the pit]
Heeeeere's Phido!

[saddened that Phido wants to eat him]
You too, Phido?... Man's best friend.

[dying]
For Zig Zag then... This is... THE END
PLAY BALL!
Father, I'm smarter than any man in this city. And, faster than your clumsy - henchman.
So where's the roadkill; a bird's gotta ear, you know.
Is this when we eat? I need to eat, I don't see any food; I'm still hungry here.
[seeing One-Eye]
I think I just lost my appetite.

[laughs when he hears Zig Zag set for a fate that will probably kill him]
And I'll eat the leftovers.
Belief in yourself is what you lack. Attack, attack, and never look back.

[urgently]
Back to the city, Roofless. Hurry! Hurry!

[wearily giving chase]
Yeah, "hurry"; *you're* being carried!
